scripts.start: BROWSER=none PORT=3000 CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true FAST_REFRESH=false react-scripts start
scripts.bundle:theme: cd build && dir-archiver --src . --dest ../the-cedars.zip --exclude .DS_Store .stylelintrc.json .eslintrc .gitattributes .github .gitignore composer.json composer.lock node_modules package-lock.json package.json .travis.yml phpcs.xml.dist sass style.css.map
scripts.bundle:plugin: cd plugins/the-directory && dir-archiver --src . --dest ../../the-directory.zip --exclude .DS_Store .stylelintrc.json .eslintrc .gitattributes .github .gitignore composer.json composer.lock node_modules package-lock.json package.json .travis.yml phpcs.xml.dist sass style.css.map
